programme.title: AUS-USA - Women's Semi-Final | Water Polo | Olympics Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Women's Semi-Final match between Australia v The United States of America took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 08/08/24. Final score AUS 8(6):(5)8 USA.

programme.title: Original Fuel (Film)
programme.desc: In the former Soviet Union, athletes representing young republics have forged their own path to DIY training and Olympic success.

programme.title: Women´s Team Bronze Medal Match MEX - NED | Archery | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Bronze Medal Match between Mexico and the Netherlands at Invalides, Paris, on 28/07/24. Team Mexico won Bronze with a victory of 6:2.

programme.title: Men's Team Gold Medal Match KOR - FRA | Archery | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's Team Gold Medal Match took place at Invalides, Paris, on 29/07/24. The Republic of Korea won the Gold Medal with a victory over France, who won Silver, 5:1

programme.title: The Enhamed Enhamed story (extended version)
programme.desc: Enhamed Enhamed grew up blind in Laayoune, Morocco but an incredible sporting journey began when he moved to Spain and started swimming.

programme.title: Becoming an Olympic Legend | 72 - A Gathering of Champions
programme.desc: Fifty years after his famous tally of seven Olympic gold medals and seven world records, legendary swimmer Mark Spitz makes an emotional return to Munich Olympic Park and the swimming pool, where his life was changed forever.

programme.title: USA-NED - Women's Bronze Medal Match | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Bronze Medal Match The United States of America v Netherlands took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 10/08/2024. Netherlands won the Bronze with a final score NED 11:10 USA.

programme.title: Teams Free Routine | Artistic Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Teams Free Routine took place at Aquatics Centre, Paris, on 06/08/24.

programme.title: Women's Trap Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Trap Finals took place on 31/07/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre. Adriana Ruano (GUA) won Gold, Silvana Stanco (ITA) won Silver, and Penny Smith (AUS) won Bronze.

programme.title: Taking Refuge (Full Length Documentary)
programme.desc: Inspired to make the world a better place through sport, three-time Olympic gold medallist Niccolo Campriani leads three refugees on a brave journey to qualify for the next Olympic Games in the Air Rifle event. Using mental and physical skills honed over years as a professional athlete, Campriani coaches and mentors Mahdi, Khaoula and Luna on a journey of learning, rediscovery and finding inner peace through the unifying power of sport. Taking Refuge follows Niccolo and his team of athletes as they set out to achieve their Olympic dream.

programme.title: Memory Lane | 72 - A Gathering of Champions
programme.desc: Fifty years after their Olympic victories in Munich, famed gymnast Olga Korbut, Germany’s long jump star Heide Rosendahl, Kenya’s long-distance running hero Kip Keino and Great Britain’s celebrated pentathlete Mary Peters make an emotional return to the scene of their gold medal wins.

programme.title: Finals | Cycling BMX | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Cycling BMX Freestyle Finals took place on 31/07/2024 at La Concorde, Paris. In the Women's Final, Deng Yawen (CHN) took the Gold, Perris Benegas (USA) took the Silver, and Natalya Diehm (AUS) took the Bronze. In the Men's Final, Jose Torres Gil (ARG) won Gold, Kieran Darren David Reilly (GBR) won Silver, and Anthony Jeanjean (FRA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Kieran Reilly’s ride to the world stage | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Join Kieran Reilly on his quest for Olympic glory as he reflects on his journey from Gateshead to becoming BMX world champion. He navigates the challenges of training, family support, and personal growth, while striving to make his hometown proud. Follow his inspirational story as he prepares to represent his community at the next Olympic Games in Paris 2024.

programme.title: From The Top Episode 2: Charlotte Worthington and The Vamps
programme.desc: Olympic BMX champion Charlotte Worthington meets one of her favourite bands, The Vamps. After attending their concert and hanging our backstage, she invites them for some action at the BMX park. Will they be up for the challenge?

programme.title: Olympic Qualifier Series Last Chance to Paris 2024 | BMX Freestyle Budapest
programme.desc: Nikita Ducarroz and Natalya Diehm share friendship and rivalry, while Anthony Jeanjean strategizes and Logan Martin faces disappointment. Jude Jones talks about Olympic ambitions. Emotional highs and lows culminate in heartfelt celebrations and dreams of Paris 2024.

programme.title: Olympic Qualifier Series Last Chance to Paris 2024 | BMX Freestyle Shanghai
programme.desc: Watch Hannah Roberts striving for gold, Daniel Dhers' spectacular BMX ride, and Queen Villegas' historic journey. Experience the highs, lows, and camaraderie in this thrilling competition. Watch these athletes give their all for a chance to compete in Paris 2024.

programme.title: Teresa Portela Olympic longevity makes her a legend | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Marked by determination, Teresa Portela's journey unfolds over six Olympics. From Rio to Tokyo, Portela's pursuit of Olympic glory was balanced between being an elite athlete and the joys of motherhood. In Tokyo, she finally won a long-awaited medal by bringing home silver in the K-1 200 canoe sprint event. Now training for Paris 2024, she will become the first Spanish woman to compete in seven Olympic Games.

programme.title: Women's Canoe (C1) Semi-Final & Final | Canoe Slalom | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Semi-Finals for Women's Canoe Slalom . The races took place at Nautical St. White Water, Paris, on 31/07/24.

programme.title: Ayomide: Born in a canoe, now a Nigerian rowing star | Playing Fields
programme.desc: Her mother gave birth to her inside a canoe some 20 years ago. Ayomide Bello grew up to become the first female canoeist from Nigeria to qualify for the Olympics.

programme.title: Daniele Molmenti Cooks with Chef Emanuel Escarello
programme.desc: Italian canoeist champ learns how to prepare a “gold medal” worthy octopus with chickpeas & saffron

programme.title: FRA-IRI - Men's Sabre Team Bronze Medal Bout | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Sabre Team Bronze Medal Bout between Iran and France took place on 31/07/2024 at the Grand Palais. The French team took the Bronze medal. Final Score FRA 45:25 IRI.

programme.title: KOR-HUN - Men's Sabre Team Gold Medal Bout | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Sabre Team Gold Medal Bout between The Republic of Korea and Hungary took place on 31/07/2024 at the Grand Palais. The South Korean team took the Gold medal, and the Hungarian one won Silver. Final Score KOR 45:41 HUN.

programme.title: Enzo Lefort's quest for individual gold at Paris 2024 | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Explore Enzo Lefort's journey from his Guadeloupean roots to the Paris 2024 Olympics, driven by his ambition for individual gold. Witness his rigorous training regimen and unwavering determination, fueled by past victories at World Championships and Olympic Games in the team events. As the Games draw near, Lefort's focus intensifies as he prepares to compete on home turf, aiming to etch his name in Olympic history with a triumphant performance in a memorable venue: le Grand Palais at the heart of Paris.

programme.title: Men's Individual All-Around Final | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's All-Around Artistic Gymnastics Final took place on 31/07/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Shinnosuke Oka (JPN) claimed the Gold, Boheng Zhang (CHN) took the Silver, and Ruoteng Xiao (CHN) the Bronze.

programme.title: It’s Not All Work
programme.desc: The off-season allows a brief break from gymnastics for Angelina. Training intensifies for a fired-up Morgan, while Yile reaches breaking point.

programme.title: The Interruption
programme.desc: The COVID-19 pandemic rocks the gymnasts’ schedules. The Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games are heartbreakingly postponed. The three gymnasts remain determined to chase their Olympic dreams.

programme.title: All Around | The Tokyo 2020 Journey Ends with Gold
programme.desc: In this final episode of the series All Around, ROC’s Angelina Melnikova revisits the details of her triumph at Tokyo 2020 and looks back at the journey that brought her to win three Olympic medals in artistic gymnastics. USA’s Morgan Hurd and China’s Chen Yile follow the Games from home as they consider their plans for their future in gymnastics and overall life. The episode also looks back at the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games qualifiers.

programme.title: Mat 1: Women's -70kg, Men's -90kg Repechages/Semi-Finals/Finals | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Women's -70kg and Men's -90kg Finals took place on 31/07/2024 at the Champ-de-Mars Arena, Paris.
At the Women's -70kg, Barbara Matic (CRO) claimed the Gold medal, Miriam Butkereit (GER) won the Silver, and the Bronze medals went to Gabriela Willems (BEL) and Michaela Polleres (AUT).
At the Men's -90kg, Lasha Bekauri (GEO) won the Gold medal, Sanshiro Murao (JPN) took the Silver, and the Bronze medals went to Theodoros Tselidis (GRE) and Maxime-Gael Ngayap Hambou (FRA).

programme.title: Transform My Meal: Italy
programme.desc: Four Italian Olympic athletes meet up with world-class chefs in Rome, Udine, Brescia and Piedmont to introduce more variety into their training diet.

programme.title: Greek champions and children of Athens 2004 keep Olympic flame burning
programme.desc: Twelve years on, we catch up with Olympic heroes Pyrros Dimas and Ilias Iliadis, and the little girl who blew out the 2004 Olympic flame.

programme.title: Women's 1500m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 1500m Freestyle was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Katie LeDecky (USA) claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 15:30.02 seconds, Anastasiia Kirpichnikova (FRA) took Silver, and Isabel Gose (GER) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 200m Breaststroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Breaststroke was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Leon Marchand (FRA) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record of 2:05.85, Zac Stubblety-Cook (AUS) took Silver and Casper Corbeau (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 100m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 100m Freestyle was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Zhanle Pan (CHN) claimed Gold with a new World Record time of 46.40 seconds, Kyle Chalmers (AUS) took Silver, and David Popovici (ROU) completed the podium.

programme.title: Becoming an Olympic Legend | 72 - A Gathering of Champions
programme.desc: Fifty years after his famous tally of seven Olympic gold medals and seven world records, legendary swimmer Mark Spitz makes an emotional return to Munich Olympic Park and the swimming pool, where his life was changed forever.

programme.title: Ayomide: Born in a canoe, now a Nigerian rowing star | Playing Fields
programme.desc: Her mother gave birth to her inside a canoe some 20 years ago. Ayomide Bello grew up to become the first female canoeist from Nigeria to qualify for the Olympics.

programme.title: Women's Kayak (K1) Semi-Final & Final | Canoe Slalom | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Kayak (K1) Semifinal and Final took place at Nautical St - White Water, on 28/07/24. The Australian Jessica Fox won the Gold with a time of 96.08 seconds. Klaudia Zwolinska (POL) won the Silver, and Kimberley Woods (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: The Distance | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: The story of an enduring Japanese marathon tradition and a humble champion named Naoko Takahashi who captured her nation’s imagination with a run for the ages at the 2000 Olympic Games.

programme.title: Body+ (Film)
programme.desc: Meet the inspiring athletes who are redefining what it means to have the perfect body.

programme.title: Finals Piste: Women's Foil Team Bronze & Gold Medal Bouts | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Foil Team Bronze and Gold Medal Bouts took place on 01/08/2024 at the Grand Palais - Podium Piste. In the Gold Medal Bout, United States of America won the Gold over Italy, who won Silver. In the Bronze Medal Bout, Japan took the Bronze over Canada.

programme.title: Meet the entourage of Miles Chamley-Watson, Jaime Espinal and Devin Logan
programme.desc: Miles Chamley-Watson (USA) x Tattoo artist; Jaime Espinal (PUR) x Mentor; Devin Logan (USA) x Ski Technician

programme.title: Ines & Erwann: The fencers who made it against every prejudice
programme.desc: Tunisian fencer Inès Boubakri and her French partner Erwann Le Péchoux tell their story. Difficulties, polemics and so much joy.

programme.title: Women's 200m Butterfly - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Butterfly was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Summer McIntosh (CAN) claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 2:03.03, Regan Smith (USA) took Silver and Yufei Zhang (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x200m Freestyle Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 4x200m Freestyle Relay was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Australia claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 07:38.08, United States of America took Silver and China completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 200m Backstroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Backstroke was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Hubert Kos (HUN) claimed Gold with a time of 1:54.26, Apostolos Christou (GRE) took Silver and Roman Mityukov (SUI) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Breaststroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Breastroke was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Kate Douglass (USA) claimed Gold with a time of 02:19.24, Tatjana Smith (RSA) took Silver and Tes Schouten (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Road to Glory - Aquatics
programme.desc: The best diving, swimming and water polo stories from throughout Olympic history including Dawn Fraser, Greg Louganis and Michael Phelps.

programme.title: Women's Individual All-Around Final | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Individual All-Around Final took place at Bercy Arena on 01/08/2024. Simone Biles won Gold (USA), Rebeca Andrade Silver (BRA) and Sunisa Lee (USA) Bronze.

programme.title: The Journey Begins
programme.desc: With the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games fast approaching, three of the best gymnasts in the world gear up for the most important year of their lives.

programme.title: Competition Season
programme.desc: Morgan and Angelina attempt to handle the pressure of the world stage. Will they succeed? Yile has a point to prove in training.

programme.title: The World Championships 2019
programme.desc: The World Championships are here. The three gymnasts learn whether they’re selected for their national teams. All the drama from the biggest competition of the season.

programme.title: Can Russia’s rhythmic gymnast Margarita Mamun transform this Z Team?
programme.desc: Olympic gold medalist Margarita Mamun tries to turn around the fortunes of Moscow’s Pirouette Gymnastics team. Is one week enough?

programme.title: Memory Lane | 72 - A Gathering of Champions
programme.desc: Fifty years after their Olympic victories in Munich, famed gymnast Olga Korbut, Germany’s long jump star Heide Rosendahl, Kenya’s long-distance running hero Kip Keino and Great Britain’s celebrated pentathlete Mary Peters make an emotional return to the scene of their gold medal wins.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 6 | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Women's 200m Butterfly Final, Men's 200m Backstroke Final, Women's 200m Breaststroke Final and Women's 4X200m Freestyle Relay Final. The races took place at Paris La Defense Arena, on 01/08/2024.
